scripts.preview: npm run r2-upload-test-image-local && wrangler pages dev ./dist
scripts.r2-help:
echo '
ðŸ“¦ R2 Storage Commands:

  npm run r2-upload-test-image-remote - Upload test image to LIVE R2 bucket
  npm run r2-upload-test-image-local  - Upload test image to LOCAL R2 simulation
  npm run upload-to-r2 [file] [r2path] -- --remote - Upload any file to LIVE R2
  npm run upload-to-r2 [file] [r2path] -- --local  - Upload any file to LOCAL R2
  npm run r2-help                     - Show this help message
'
scripts.r2-fix: npm run r2-upload-test-image-local && wrangler pages dev ./dist
scripts.r2-super-fix: npm run r2-direct && npm run build && npm run preview
